Articles.Content:
Sorry about how nooby this sounds but... could someone with modding expertise make this for me? I will be forever grateful!

http://www.wired.com/wiredscience/2012/06/mcdonnell-douglas-phase-b-12-man-space-station-1970/

You could totally build that with just a few of the existing mods in the add-on releases section of the forums. It almost looks kerbal, at first glance that could be mistaken for a KSP screenshot

There's one, but there are some really great mods that you can build awesome things with!
*chuckles as two of the astronauts in the wardroom (image near the end of the article) are clearly CPT Kirk and LCDR Spock*
I know, but I would like somebody to custom-make it, so everything works perfectly.
